'Hybrid' is an album by Michael Brook with Brian Eno and Daniel Lanois. A
specialist in timbre and texture, Brook pioneered the infinite guitar - a guitar
outfitted with a feedback transducer to produce non-decaying sustain of any note
- which makes its first notable appearance on this album
